plham.main

Class Simulator

  • plham.Env
    • plham.main.Simulator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Main

    abstract public class Simulator
extends Env
    A base class for simulation models. See plham.main.Runner for execution models. See the subclass plham.Main for the core methods.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class plham.Env

      • createItemGroup

        protected <T> List<T> createItemGroup(JSON.Value json,
                                               String className,
                                               String keyword)
        For the item grouping technology based on the idea of keyword chain in JSON.
        Parameters:
        json -
        className - a dummy class name, e.g., "AgentGroup"
        keyword - a name for keyword chain, e.g., "agents"
        Returns:
        a list of items
